snippet: Newly elected to the Senate, Ms. Hanson, the leader of the One Nation party, also called for a ban on the burqa....
abstract: Newly elected Australian Sen Pauline Hanson proposes ban on Muslim immigration and outlawing burqa.
lead_paragraph: Newly elected to the Senate, Ms. Hanson, the leader of the One Nation party, also called for a ban on the burqa.

headline.main: Pauline Hanson, Australian Senator, Urges End to Muslim Immigration
headline.print_headline: Far-Right Australian Senator Urges End to Muslim Immigration
